alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 09 at 5:48AM EST until January 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to locally 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie county. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate to heavy snowfall begins before sunrise Monday morning then continues into the evening. Blowing and drifting of snow may become a significant issue by the afternoon.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
